html: 1 papers for Continual Learning for Wireless Channel Prediction accepted @ @ICML 2025 Workshop taking place in Vancouver.
1 papers for RAG Optimized Wireless Environment Perception accepted and awarded best workshop paper @ICC 2025 Workshop taking place in Montreal.
Delivered a presentation titled “AI in Healthcare” at Norman Regional Hospital under the supervision of Dr. Lubna Mirza.
Recipient of the College of Engineering Graduate Fellowship 2025.
2 papers for Hierarchichal Deep RL and Joint Source Compression accepted @ @AAAI 2025 Workshop taking place in Philadelpia.
Runner-up Award for Best Student Presentation at the IEEE DSAA'24 Student Forum.
Awarded the Student Travel Grant for IEEE DSAA 2024.
Final Year Project received the 1st Best Adjudged Industrial Project Award at the NUST Open House 2024.
PhD Acceptence from University of Oklahoma with Graduate Fellowship.
Winner of the Prime Minister Laptop Scheme.
Selected as an Undergraduate Research Intern for the First Cohort of UGRIP by MBZUAI.
